text: 2.12: Ro 6.19; Ef 1.4; Kor 1.22; 1 Te 4.7; 1 Zo 2.16Mba Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbar, ana khuen nza khɨvi, nza kɨr Fhe Bakɨme sɨrga tuktɨgi fhu. Nza vhɨra kha nuiana vuzvugi mbatɨgi, tharga. Ana vhɨra khuen nza khɨvi, nza tuituigi piigip tɨvir vhuuiŋra zɨn ŋgɨp za Fhe Bakɨmen tɨva guara zɨn ŋgɨrga. Khueŋ guigira, nza kha nuiana gumgi rɨgar ki. Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbar ana khuen nza khɨvigi, nza Fhe Bakɨmen tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨrga.
